basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Kameron Watts, a motivated software developer from Seattle, WA. I discovered my passion for coding in 2019 during a deployment. In my downtime, I would create funny websites for my friends to laugh at. This is before I knew about GitHub, and since then, I have a new laptop. I am currently transitioning from the public safety field into software development. My hobbies are a toss up between cinematic photography and restuarant-hopping. My attention-to-detail, ability to learn quickly, creativity, and ability to problem-solve in a team-oriented environment will catapult me into a successful software development career.

projects.title: My photography website
projects.description: I always wanted to have my own photography website. I decided to take on the task myself instead of building one on darkroom. I build this website with a glassmorphic-neon theme in mind. I want this webpage to feel like home to the viewer, just as much as it feels like home to me.

projects.title: Blog Website
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: Space Monkeys: The Game
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
